content: Is the a CI system for org.hl7.fhir.core running or is it planned @James Agnew @Grahame Grieve ? I noted that my pull request got stale [GF#20324] FML support for share in Target Transform with the latest commits and updated it. I created also a new pull request for [GF#20482] FHIRPath conformsTo Validation of Warnings/Error handling which I hope you can consider.
it's on my list of things to do. I'm far behind right now after being on the road almost continuously for 4 weeks
but I would like a CI build for it, yes
